title: Hextech crafting failed
body: I just rerolled three skin shards in one permanent skin and in the process, just nothing came out and there was a hextech crafting error. My three skin shards are gone and I have no new permanent skin, HELP!!??

replies.body: No worries, sounds like that was just a simple visual error. After looking over your crafting history, it looks like you got Ragdoll Poppy from that skin reroll.
Hi, Excuse me but I've had the same issue, may you check my crafting history too? I don't understand why this happened ;^;
